stock_sentiment

finlang.plotting.app module¶

This module implements the dash plotly app for the alpha-sentiment dashboard, all data is preloaded into memory for quick display of various graph settings selected by the user

finlang.plotting.app.update_button_timer(n_clicks, data)¶

Checks if enough time has passed between update requests

Parameters

  • n_clicks – how many updates requested by user

  • data – dictionary of json data stored in user’s browser - in this case it stores the time the last click was requested, and it was accepted.

Raises

dash.exceptions.PreventUpdate: If not enough time has passed between requests and updates

Returns

Dictionary with key ‘last_click’ and the timestamp of the last click that was allowed

finlang.plotting.app.update_figure(data, start, end, freq, keywords, sources, model, summary, options)¶

Updates figure and data given the current user selected settings
